name: Me Girl Love Story - Date Game
name_original: Me Girl Love Story - Date Game
description:
Fall in love again with Me Girl Love Story, a quirky 3D dating game!

There’s only one way to get to the top in this dating adventure! Unlock all of the guys to claim the title of best dating columnist in the city! Publish articles about your dates, work exciting assignments, play fun mini games, and shop for fabulous fashions! Love again and again.

Put your dating shoes on!
* DATE guys like the barista, a heroic knight, a billionaire and more!
* FLIRT to break the ice in a fun mini game
* MATCH 3 or more in a row to win his heart on a date
* PUBLISH quirky articles about the guy you’re dating
* SHOP for chic 3D styles

Hot fashions, hot guys.
- 1000s of stunning fashions, makeup and more
- Lots of different men to flirt with and date
- Fun stories and quests to achieve
- Discover and even craft guys
- Live out a dream career.

Can you date them all? Live the dream and play Me Girl Love Story now!

__________________________________
Notes:
- You can play offline, data is required for In-App Purchasing
- The game will download new content automatically
